body.name: Pure Enrichment® PureSteam™ XL Standing Steamer with Garment Hanger - Heats in 45 Seconds with 0.5-Gallon Water Tank for 1 Hour Continuous Steaming - Includes Fabric Brush and Easy-roll Wheels
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 mins
features: SUPERIOR STEAM OUTPUT: With up to 1500 watts of safe power, easily soften, refresh, and de-wrinkle a wide range of fabrics including clothing, delicates, bedding, curtains, upholstered furniture, and more
SAFE & GENTLE CLEANING: Premium steam cleans and deodorizes to rid your clothes of any lingering spots or odors, so you always have the freshest fabrics
HEATS IN SECONDS: Heats in 45 seconds for quick and powerful steaming that gets you out the door and on your way
REMOVABLE ½ GALLON WATER TANK: Simply detach to refill for convenient, mess-free refills for up to 60 minutes of continuous steaming per fill

WHAT YOU GET: Upright garment steamer, fabric brush, garment hanger, and Pure Enrichment’s guaranteed 2-Year Warranty. Our customer support team provides daily quality service and peace of mind to millions worldwide all from a brand you can trust.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PureSteam XL Standing Steamer Product Specifications: Base Dimensions: 14” x 9.25” x 12.2” | Total Height: 5’, 5” | Weight: 10 lbs, 9 oz | Power Cord Length: 7’

Dewrinkle Your Garments Refresh fabrics in just 45 seconds with help from the versatile adjustable-width hanger and handy fabric brush attachment. The telescopic pole with flexible hose allows you to effortlessly steam different sized garments and remove tough wrinkles. Detachable Water Tank Steam clothing or other household fabrics without running out of water with our large ½ gallon tank. This high-capacity tank lasts for up to one hour of continuous use, while the visible design allows for easy water level monitoring. The easy detachable tank makes filling or emptying the tank a breeze. All-Natural Cleaning Clean and deodorize any type of fabric. This premium steam cleaner is gentle enough for all fabric types, like silks, cotton, linen, denim, and more. Powerful & Versatile PureSteam XL is not just for steaming your clothes. De-wrinkle and freshen a variety of fabrics, including clothing, coats, curtains, drapes, table linens, upholstered furniture, and mattresses.

Convenient and Easy Storage A removable hose and handy rolling wheels make our easy-to-use upright steamer easy to store and less cumbersome than traditional ironing boards. Save Time & Money In just 45 seconds, quickly steam your favorite clothes and save money on expensive dry cleaning services. Maintain Your Favorite Fabrics Garment steamers are a gentler alternative for fabrics, keeping them fresher, cleaner, and wrinkle-free longer than traditional methods.

PureSteam XL PureSteam Pro PureSteam Portable (White) PureSteam Portable (Black) Size 14” x 9.25” x 12.2” 13.7” x 8.9” x 11” 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ 8″ x 5.5″ x 3.2″ Tank Capacity 2 L 2 L 130 ml 130 ml Heating Time 45 seconds 45 seconds 2 minutes 2 minutes Steam Time Up to 60 minutes per tank refill Up to 60 minutes per tank refill on Level 4 10 minutes 10 minutes Steam Levels 1 4 1 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Steamer! Excellent Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: This unit takes under a minute to setup. It's heats fast and steams efficiently and gets the job done. It's price point can't be beat compared to the other "PRO" units we have purchased at 5x the price. The Shelf life is about the same as PRO units/ if it's not descaled and/or treated appropriately. It's light and easy to move around if needed. Cleaning is easy and foolproof.Wish List: (Optional but Not Necessary)1. More Attachments for Steaming Options2. Longer Telescope Length for Stand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Puresteam xl
reviews.reviewText: I recently stumbled upon the Puresteam XL Standing Fabric Steamer, and I can't contain my excitement about this little powerhouse. This incredible device has become an indispensable addition to my household, revolutionizing the way I tackle various fabric-related tasks. From steaming curtains to refreshing clothes, coats, and even steam cleaning, this steamer does it all effortlessly.First and foremost, the Puresteam XL is an absolute wizard when it comes to steaming curtains. Gone are the days of struggling with bulky, unmanageable ironing boards. With its impressive steam power, this steamer quickly removes wrinkles and restores a pristine look to my curtains, effortlessly breathing new life into the entire room.But its functionality doesn't stop there. I'm amazed at how versatile this steamer is. It effortlessly handles clothes of all types and fabrics. Whether it's delicate silk blouses, sturdy denim jeans, or even heavy winter coats, this steamer tackles them all with ease, making ironing a thing of the past.One of the standout features of the Puresteam XL is its compact design. Unlike traditional irons, which take up a significant amount of space, this steamer is a space-saving wonder. It's compact and easily fits into a small storage area, making it a perfect choice for those with limited space. I no longer need to sacrifice precious closet space for a bulky ironing board or wrestle with folding it away after every use.The steamer's ease of use is also worth mentioning. It heats up incredibly fast, and the continuous steam flow ensures a smooth and efficient steaming experience. The large water tank capacity allows for extended steaming sessions without the hassle of frequent refills. It's truly a time-saving gem!What sets the Puresteam XL apart is its ability to double as a steam cleaner. I've used it to sanitize and freshen up my upholstery, carpets, and even mattresses. The hot steam effortlessly kills germs and removes dirt, leaving everything looking and feeling immaculate. It's like having a professional cleaning service right at my fingertips.In conclusion, the Puresteam XL Standing Fabric Steamer has been a game-changer for me. Its versatility, compact design, and exceptional performance have made it a must-have household item. Say goodbye to ironing woes and hello to a more efficient and effective steaming experience. If you're looking for a reliable, multifunctional steamer that will simplify your life, look no further than the Puresteam XL. It's a game-changer, and I can't recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: purchased the Pure Enrichment PureSteam XL Standing Steamer with Garment Hanger, and my experience has been somewhat mixed. While it has its strengths, there are notable drawbacks that left me with a sense of ambivalence.On the positive side, the standing steamer design is convenient, and the garment hanger is a thoughtful addition. It makes the steaming process more manageable, allowing for hands-free operation and minimizing the hassle of holding a steamer by hand.The steamer heats up quickly, saving time when I need to freshen up my clothes in a hurry. The water tank capacity is also decent, providing ample steam for multiple garments before needing a refill. The adjustable height feature is a plus, accommodating various clothing items easily.However, my main issue with this steamer is its performance on different fabric types. It seems to work well on lighter fabrics such as cotton and linen, but when it comes to heavier materials like wool or certain synthetic blends, the results are less impressive. I found myself having to go over the same spots repeatedly to achieve the desired level of wrinkle release.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, worth the money and very convenient for those who hate ironing.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, worth the money and very convenient for those who hate ironing.The PureSteamXL is a great steamer that saves time and works as an excellent replacement to a standard ironing. I have used it on a variety of fabrics and clothing and it works great on everything especially, curtains, and bed linen. It heats up quickly, and produces enough steam, the high heat minimizes the time needed to get all the wrinkles! I am able to reduce the amount of items I bring to the dry cleaners, which is a great cost savings for me, as well.Steamer comes with some nice features, a hanger with a telescopic mount, a compact design, which is also easy to take apart and reassemble as needed, the space-saving design makes it a perfect choice for someone in smaller size homes. It also comes with a fabric brush attachment, which actually makes a difference when steaming shirts!The steamer is well-priced and seems to be well made and durable. I have already used it multiple times without issue. I do wish that the hose was a little bit longer, and that the switch was operated by a pedal/foot mechanism instead of a constant steam flow. However, this is no reason not to purchase the item, and would still choose this over other products out there.Overall great steamer, worth the money spent and very convenient in many aspects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good steam flow
reviews.reviewText: Very lightweight but built so that it doesn't topple over easy. Packaging was sufficient and sturdy. Instructions were clear - easy to put together and use. Good steam flow, knocks most wrinkles out in about three passes. I wouldn't carry it on a trip, though. Too much to cart around with luggage and stuff. Good product, would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy set up. Heated up super fast and got all the wrinkles out of my linen and cotton slip covers perfectly
